replies.msg:
https://www.quora.com/How-can-your-location-be-identified-by-your-IP-address
Mobile Data Network - When a mobile phone is connected to a cellular basestation it shares the IP address given by the base station. so you can look up the IP address using the whois service but again here the location will be that of the base station not exactly the mobile phone but you can pretty much assume that the mobile phone is in the vicinity of the base station.

Best way to find the location of a mobile if by getting its gps co-ordinates provided it has one.

只有gps 先會知道，我唔知tg會唔會report個gps location你知

- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
最新版本會長駐個post最底部
黑警罪證 避免阻止大家睇post 以後會用貼link方式推post 請大家有時間㩒入嚟睇一睇 用心記住黑警嘅惡行 手足所受嘅傷
無論如何都絕不可以原諒黑警 要佢哋血債血償 將呢3個月香港人所受嘅苦全部償還
一個人力量太小 如果有遺留 可以自己更新/同我講 亦請有識之士幫手翻譯不同版本
感激大家 光復香港 時代革命
請留意各宗「自殺事件」,唔好畀佢哋嘅事沉底呀
